Package cinemapackage

Interface ICinema

All Known Implementing Classes:
CinemaManager
public interface ICinema
Interface for CinemaManger interaction
Since:
06-11-2022
Author:
Ng Tze Kean

  • Method Details

    • createCinema

      void createCinema(String code, String type)
      Create a new cinema in cinema manager. Performs check if size of code is 3. Performs check if type is valid.
      Parameters:
      code - of length 3
      type - ["Platinum", "Gold", "Silver"]

    • deleteCinema

      void deleteCinema(int cinemaID, ICineplex cineplexManager) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Search through array of cinemas and locate the id to be delete. If the ID is found, success message will be printed else
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      cineplexManager - ICineplex object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • printCinemas

      void printCinemas()
      Prints all cinema under CinemaManger. Format printed is {Code,Type}

    • printCinemasAdmin

      void printCinemasAdmin()
      Prints all cinema under CinemaManger in admin view. Format printed is {Id,Code,Type}

    • getCinema

      Cinema getCinema(int cinemaID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Finds the requested cinemaID and returns the cinema object. Function should be used with care and only by staff object to modify Cinema template Used in showtime class.
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      Returns:
      Cinema
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cinemaID not found

    • getCinemaCode

      String getCinemaCode(int cinemaID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Finds requested cinemaID in and returns the cinema code of target
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      Returns:
      String of cinema code
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cinemaID not found

    • setCinemaCode

      void setCinemaCode(int cinemaID, String code) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets cinema code of target cinema. Finds the ID of the cinema in array and updates the Cinema code.
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cinemaID not found

    • getCinemaType

      CinemaType getCinemaType(int cinemaID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns an enum of the type of cinema requested
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      Returns:
      CinemaType enum type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • setCinemaType

      void setCinemaType(int cinemaID, CinemaType type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Setter to modify the cinema type
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      type - CinemaType variable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getCineplexID

      int getCineplexID(int cinemaID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the cineplex ID the cinema belongs to. Returns -1 if there is no valid cineplex
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      Returns:
      integer of the cineplex cinema belongs to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • getCineplexID

      int getCineplexID(String cinemaCode) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the cineplex ID of a cinema
      Parameters:
      cinemaCode - integer variable
      Returns:
      integer CineplexID target
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • setCineplexID

      void setCineplexID(int cinemaID, int cineplexID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Setter for a cinema object to change the cineplex it belongs to
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - integer variable
      cineplexID - integer variable
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      Cinema cloneCinemaByID(int ID)
